pageTitle: Replace calls to drupal_container()->get('module_handler') service with Drupal::moduleHandler() [#1957154] | Drupal.org
textBeforeTable: » Postponed Active Status: March 31, 2013 at 5:37am CreditAttribution: xjm commented xjm Comment #4 Log in or register to post comments There's a slightly more advanced task related to these issues. TestBase should do already does a \Drupal::setContainer($this->container). So, instances of $this->container->get('servicename') could also be cleaned up in tests. Skipping them for now to stick with the program. March 31, 2013 at 5:13am CreditAttribution: xjm commented xjm Comment #3 Log in or register to post comments Beta-testing these issues. » xjm Unassigned Assigned:
textAfterTable: View ] StatisticsSettingsForm takes an injected module handler and container, interestingly. Not sure about the changes in DUTB; I have a sneaking suspicion there might have been an "intended" behavior here of using drupal_container() to get the original container rather than the test environment's. Ditto ModuleApiTest, ModulesDisabledUpgradePathTest, and UpgradePathTestBase. We might need to update the instructions to skip tests on a first pass and do them separately.
